title: Travel Trailers Market in North America 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text: Travel Trailers Market in North America 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review -- NEW YORK, Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Travel Trailers Market in North America 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review NEW YORK , Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About travel trailersTravel trailers are also known as conventional trailer, bumper pull trailer, travel trailer coach, and tagalong trailer. They are designed for recreation or pleasure activities such as vacations and camping, both on and off highways. Travel trailers are available in various sizes, ranging from 9 feet to 40 feet. Models over 20 feet are generally self-contained with basic amenities as kitchen, and bathroom facilities. Travel trailers of size greater than 35 feet facilitate luxury amenities such as air conditioning and TV. Travel trailers are subject to the same registration and licensing as other automobiles, and may have to abide by specific laws.Technavio's analysts forecast the travel trailers market in North America to grow at a CAGR of 12.38% during 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the travel trailers market in North America during the forecast period. To calculate the market size, the report considers the unit sales of travel trailers. In terms of product type, travel trailers can be categorized into four segments: toy haulers, expendable, teardrop trailer, and park model. The report presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the Key Vendors in the market. In addition, it discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by the vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends emerging in the market.Technavio's report, Travel Trailers Market in North America 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. It covers the landscape of the market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the Key Vendors operating in this market. Key Vendors
